description: Detects requests to exclude files, folders or processes from Antivirus scanning using PowerShell cmdlets Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Other Cmdlets that may use the same parameters
name: Powershell Defender Exclusion
query: ((process.command_line:(*Add\-MpPreference\ * OR *Set\-MpPreference\ *) AND process.command_line:(*\ \-ExclusionPath\ * OR *\ \-ExclusionExtension\ * OR *\ \-ExclusionProcess\ *)) OR process.command_line:(*QWRkLU1wUHJlZmVyZW5jZ* OR *FkZC1NcFByZWZlcmVuY2* OR *BZGQtTXBQcmVmZXJlbmNl*))
